feature: Questionnaire Service end-to-end integration (API ⇄ DB ⇄ API)
scenario: Import questionnaire updates from CSV (create + update, no errors)
test_id: feature::Questionnaire Service end-to-end integration (API ⇄ DB ⇄ API)::scenario::Import questionnaire updates from CSV (create + update, no errors)
step_name: I POST "/questionnaires/import" with multipart file "questions.csv" containing:
exception_message:
Additional properties are not allowed ('deleted' was unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     '$id': 'https://example.com/schemas/ImportResult.schema.json',
     'title': 'ImportResult',
     'type': 'object',
     'properties': {'created': {'type': 'integer',
                                'minimum': 0,
                                'description': 'Count of questions '
                                               'created'},
                    'updated': {'type': 'integer',
                                'minimum': 0,
                                'description': 'Count of questions '
                                               'updated'},
                    'errors': {'type': 'array',
                               'description': 'Row-level errors from CSV '
                                              'import',
                               'items': {'type': 'object',
                                         'properties': {'line': {'type': 'integer',
                                                                 'minimum': 1},
                                                        'message': {'type': 'string'},
                                                        'code': {'type': 'string',
                                                                 'description': 'Optional '
                                                                                'machine-readable '
                                                                                'error '
                                                                                'code'}},
                                         'required': ['line', 'message'],
                                         'additionalProperties': False}}},
     'required': ['created', 'updated', 'errors'],
     'additionalProperties': False}

On instance:
    {'created': 1, 'updated': 1, 'deleted': 0, 'errors': []}

step_name: I POST "/questionnaires/import" with multipart file "questions.csv" containing:
exception_message:
Additional properties are not allowed ('deleted' was unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     '$id': 'https://example.com/schemas/ImportResult.schema.json',
     'title': 'ImportResult',
     'type': 'object',
     'properties': {'created': {'type': 'integer',
                                'minimum': 0,
                                'description': 'Count of questions '
                                               'created'},
                    'updated': {'type': 'integer',
                                'minimum': 0,
                                'description': 'Count of questions '
                                               'updated'},
                    'errors': {'type': 'array',
                               'description': 'Row-level errors from CSV '
                                              'import',
                               'items': {'type': 'object',
                                         'properties': {'line': {'type': 'integer',
                                                                 'minimum': 1},
                                                        'message': {'type': 'string'},
                                                        'code': {'type': 'string',
                                                                 'description': 'Optional '
                                                                                'machine-readable '
                                                                                'error '
                                                                                'code'}},
                                         'required': ['line', 'message'],
                                         'additionalProperties': False}}},
     'required': ['created', 'updated', 'errors'],
     'additionalProperties': False}

On instance:
    {'created': 1, 'updated': 1, 'deleted': 0, 'errors': []}

                                'description': 'Count of questions '

                                                        'code': {'type': 'string',

                                                                                'machine-readable '
                                                                                'error '

feature: Epic I — Conditional Visibility
scenario: PATCH to a leaf question with no descendants produces empty delta
test_id: feature::Epic I — Conditional Visibility::scenario::PATCH to a leaf question with no descendants produces empty delta
exception_message:
Additional properties are not allowed ('value_text' was unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     '$id': 'https://example.com/schemas/AnswerUpsert.schema.json',
     'title': 'AnswerUpsert',
     'type': 'object',
     'additionalProperties': False,
     'properties': {'answer_kind': {'type': 'string',
                                    'enum': ['short_string',
                                             'long_text',
                                             'boolean',
                                             'number',
                                             'enum_single']},
                    'value': {'description': 'Type-appropriate answer '
                                             'value.',
                              'oneOf': [{'type': 'string'},
                                        {'type': 'number'},
                                        {'type': 'boolean'}]},
                    'option_id': {'description': 'Required when '
                                                 'answer_kind is '
                                                 'enum_single.',
                                  'type': 'string',
                                  'format': 'uuid'},
                    'question_id': {'type': 'string', 'format': 'uuid'}},
     'anyOf': [{'required': ['value']}, {'required': ['option_id']}]}

On instance:
    {'value_text': 'ACME Trading'}

exception_message:
Additional properties are not allowed ('suppressed_answers', 'visibility_delta' were unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     '$id': 'https://example.com/schemas/AutosaveResult.schema.json',
     'title': 'AutosaveResult',
     'type': 'object',
     'properties': {'saved': {'type': 'boolean',
                              'description': 'Result flag for per-answer '
                                             'autosave'},
                    'etag': {'type': 'string',
                             'description': 'ETag token for optimistic '
                                            'concurrency'}},
     'required': ['saved', 'etag'],
     'additionalProperties': False}

On instance:
    {'saved': True,
     'etag': 'W/"810bf4818ff77676c6b111db48df11428d26b7a7"',
     'visibility_delta': {'now_visible': ['59830e92-110f-5c6b-8cae-3388c0141e97'],
                          'now_hidden': []},
     'suppressed_answers': []}

feature: Epic I — Conditional Visibility
scenario: PATCH with type mismatch returns 422 and no visibility delta
test_id: feature::Epic I — Conditional Visibility::scenario::PATCH with type mismatch returns 422 and no visibility delta
exception_message:
'title' is a required property

Failed validating 'required' in schema:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     '$id': 'https://example.com/schemas/Problem.schema.json',
     'title': 'Problem',
     'type': 'object',
     'properties': {'type': {'type': 'string', 'format': 'uri'},
                    'title': {'type': 'string'},
                    'status': {'type': 'integer'},
                    'detail': {'type': 'string'},
                    'instance': {'type': 'string',
                                 'format': 'uri-reference'}},
     'required': ['title', 'status'],
     'additionalProperties': True,
     'description': 'application/problem+json per RFC7807.'}

On instance:
    {'errors': [{'path': '$.value', 'code': 'type_mismatch'}]}

DETAIL:  Key (questionnaire_id)=(11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111) is not present in table "questionnaires".

[SQL: INSERT INTO screens (screen_id, questionnaire_id, screen_key, title) VALUES (%(sid)s, %(qid)s, %(key)s, %(title)s) ON CONFLICT (screen_id) DO UPDATE SET screen_key=EXCLUDED.screen_key, title=EXCLUDED.title]
[parameters: {'sid': '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222', 'qid': '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111', 'key': 'company', 'title': 'Company Info'}]
